name: Encouragement Login Page
author: Kazuki Yanamoto

sections.description:
This plugin will show you a character on the login page to give you encouraging words.

Sometimes you need to do some works on WordPress when you are very tired.
This character will encourage you to help you try working on your WordPress on the login page.

This will release your irritation and tiredness.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the “encouragement-login-page” directory to /wp-content/plugins/.
    Generally, upload .zip folder to WordPress.

  2. Activate “Encouragement Login Page” from “Plugin menu”.
sections.faq:
Installation Instructions

  1. Upload the “encouragement-login-page” directory to /wp-content/plugins/.
    Generally, upload .zip folder to WordPress.

  2. Activate “Encouragement Login Page” from “Plugin menu”.
